rules.title: Use the Oxford comma
rules.description: In lists of three or more items, place a comma before the conjunction.

examples.correct: We installed the software, configured the network, and updated the drivers.
examples.incorrect: We installed the software, configured the network and updated the drivers.

rules.title: Use periods for complete sentences
rules.description: End every complete sentence with a period unless it is a question or exclamation.

rules.title: Avoid excessive exclamation points
rules.description: Use exclamation points sparingly and only when necessary to convey urgency or strong emotion.

examples.correct: Warning: Data will be lost if you continue.
examples.incorrect: Warning! Data will be lost if you continue!

rules.title: Use a colon to introduce lists or examples
rules.description: Use a colon after an independent clause to introduce a list, example, or explanation.

examples.correct: You will need three items: a screwdriver, a wrench, and a hammer.
examples.incorrect: You will need: a screwdriver, a wrench, and a hammer.

rules.title: Use semicolons to separate complex list items
rules.description: Use semicolons between items in a list if the items contain commas.

examples.correct: We invited John, the manager; Lisa, the project lead; and Mark, the technician.
examples.incorrect: We invited John, the manager, Lisa, the project lead, and Mark, the technician.

rules.title: Use quotation marks correctly
rules.description: Place commas and periods inside quotation marks. Place colons and semicolons outside.

rules.title: Avoid double spaces after punctuation
rules.description: Use only one space after a period, question mark, or exclamation point.

examples.correct: The installation is complete. Restart your system.
examples.incorrect: The installation is complete.  Restart your system.

rules.title: Use ellipses for omitted text
rules.description: Use an ellipsis to indicate omitted text or a pause. Include a space before and after.

examples.correct: The report stated, 'The results were inconclusive â€¦ and further research is needed.'
examples.incorrect: The report stated, 'The results were inconclusive...and further research is needed.'
